website_summaries.verdict: This jacket stands out for its soft, stretchable fabric and the design of its various pockets.
pros: Tightly woven face resists wind and water
Stretchable fabric offers a good range of motion
Features mesh pockets inside and zippered hand-warmer pockets outside
cons: Some buyers feel this jacket is not warm enough or does not resist wind very well

customer_reviews.title: More of a motorcycle-jacket style
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5 ft 7 in tall, medium build. The size SMALL fits perfectly. Plenty of room in the shoulders, and cut is tapered a little which is comfortable if you have a more athletic build. The shoulders will look awkward if you try on a larger size. Sleeve length is good, it has a tactical look, and keep in mind it is a little short. This seems to be a deliberate design choice, as the jacket has a motorcycle-like look. This may not be to everyone's liking - Personally, I'm ok with it, though. I would recommend tucking in your shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Y

customer_reviews.title: Quite good for $$
customer_reviews.text: Was suprized in quality for this amount of $$. Fit is excellent, quality very nice, all zippers work well, guess I'll see over time is this garment wears well. My girlfriend likes, and she's picky....!
customer_reviews.author: Talus

customer_reviews.title: Great softshell jacket
customer_reviews.text: Great softshell jacket. Stylish, comfortable, warmer than I thought, and it almost looks like Northface. I have gotten many compliments already and I have been wearing this almost everyday besides the day it snows or gets very cold. Only complaint is that you will need to buy one size larger than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Identity

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Jacket... used for skiing and everyday use. Light weight, but works great for keeping you warm
customer_reviews.author: Outdoorsman

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice coat for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice coat for the price. I can feel the wind through the coat, but if you can't afford the North Face type of level then this is perfect. It's a nice light jacket with medium protection from the cold/wind.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wiegman

customer_reviews.title: If you like pointy shoulders, then this is the jacket for you
customer_reviews.text: Good colors and good fit but the shoulders are a bit pointy like a womens power suit from the 80s with shoulder pads
customer_reviews.author: onelesshero

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this jacket but M, L, XL they just weren't cut right. It;s a bit short.
customer_reviews.author: E. herndon

customer_reviews.title: Great price and it’s a good light jacket
customer_reviews.text: Great price and it’s a good light jacket. It’s a little snug, especially on my arms but maybe I’m just too muscular. Would probably order a size bigger if I were to order again.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Travis

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: very poor stitches,but for the money , you cant expect anything else .
customer_reviews.author: Vancea Cristian

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, warm, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Warm, keeps out the wind and cold in 40 degree weather. If you're under 5'8 get the small.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Loffer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, great look. Looks like a high-end Marmot or other ski softshell
customer_reviews.text: Great looking AND fitting softshell. Hopefully it performs as well as it looks. Men's small purchased and fits just as expected for that size.
customer_reviews.author: Sven Golly

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and very warm
customer_reviews.text: A little snug, but I have a broader back, so it wasn't a surprise. Very comfortable and very warm. Love the look. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Flores

product_meta.title: Arctix mens Men's Maverick Softshell Jacket
product_meta.description: The Arctix Men's Maverick Softshell Jacket is the best windproof layering jacket for cool weather action. The durable water repellent finish and exceptional 4-way stretch keeps you protected and comfortable without inhibiting mobility. Perfect for mild weather, making this your go-to jacket for fall and spring. Shell: 92 % polyester 8% spandex. Features: breathable exceptional 4-way stretch for unrestricted movement athletic fit articulated elbows zippered hand warmer style pockets. These active fit jacket is machine washable, making them perfect for outdoor activities.
feature_bullets: Tightly woven face offers wind-resistant and water resistant protection
Exceptional high stretch for improved range of motion and unrestricted movement
Soft, brushed inner face for warmth retention
